message.content:
Based on the given credit specifications and the candidates' profiles, here's the ranking from most suitable (#1) to least suitable (#4) for the mortgage loan:

#1 (Most Suitable): Age 53, Senior Software Engineer at Google
- Stable, high-income job
- Established living situation
- Well-distributed own funds
- Highest bank account balance (70,000 CHF)

#2: Age 56, Head of Communications & Marketing at Swiss Red Cross
- Stable, high-income job
- Established professional career
- Solid own funds distribution
- No negative factors

#3: Age 31, Architect & Project Manager at Herzog & de Meuron
- Young professional
- Stable job, good employer
- Solid own funds
- Slightly less financial stability compared to older candidates

#4 (Least Suitable): Age 40, Auditor at KPMG
- Lowest bank account balance
- Smaller Pillar 3a and other funds
- Single status
- No significant negative factors, but relatively weaker financial profile compared to other candidates

The ranking considers age, professional stability, income, and distribution of own funds.
